description: Investigator requests breast cancer patients aged 40‑65 with HER2‑positive status; the AI parses the eligibility, queries the EMR, returns matching patients, and sends secure recruitment messages asking for consent.

messages.content: You are TrialMatchAI, an autonomous assistant that helps investigators locate eligible patients and contact them securely, while maintaining audit logs.
I need to find breast cancer patients aged 40‑65 who are HER2‑positive.
First, I will translate the eligibility text into a structured format.

arguments.eligibility_text: Inclusion criteria: Patients must be female, aged 40 to 65 years, with a diagnosis of HER2-positive breast cancer. Exclusion criteria: Prior therapy with HER2-targeted agents, metastatic disease, or serious comorbidities.

messages.content: Now I will search the EMR for patients matching these criteria.
I found 2 patients meeting the criteria: P001 (52 F) and P005 (44 F). Would you like me to send them a recruitment message?
Yes, send a message with study details and ask for consent.
Drafting secure portal messages for each patient.

arguments.subject: Study Invitation: HER2‑Positive Breast Cancer Trial
arguments.body:
Dear Patient,

We are inviting you to consider participation in a Phase II trial evaluating a new HER2‑targeted therapy for breast cancer. Eligibility: female, age 40‑65, HER2‑positive. Please review the attached brochure and let us know if you consent to be contacted by the study coordinator.

[View Brochure](https://example.com/brochure.pdf)

Thank you,
Study Team
